channel.title: Player stuck in geometry [Fixed]
channel.description:
In the toxic slime pit (shortly before reaching the blast pit) I slipped down a gap in the catwalk and could not get out. Had to noclip to get out.
[url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96554432']Screenshot - [steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/f ... d=96554432](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=96554432)[/url]
Didn't getpos it (as I didn't realize I should when playing through this area).

item.title: Player stuck in geometry [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: gyphie
item.description:
In the toxic slime pit (shortly before reaching the blast pit) I slipped down a gap in the catwalk and could not get out. Had to noclip to get out.

Screenshot - steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/f … d=96554432

Didn’t getpos it (as I didn’t realize I should when playing through this area).
